subject: Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph:
With the 24th overall pick in the N.B.A. draft, the Knicks chose 
Michigan’s Tim Hardaway Jr., whose father, as a member of the Heat, battled the Knicks in the late 1990s.
snippet:
